args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex

/-- For any complex z, |sinh z| ≤ 1/2 * exp |z|. -/
theorem abs_sinh_le_half_exp_abs (z : Complex) : |sinh z| ≤ (1/2) * exp |z| := by
  sorry

/-- For any complex z, |cosh z| ≤ 1/2 * exp |z|. -/
theorem abs_cosh_le_half_exp_abs (z : Complex) : |cosh z| ≤ (1/2) * exp |z| := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex

/-- For any complex z, abs (sinh z) ≤ 1/2 * exp (abs z). -/
theorem abs_sinh_le_half_exp_abs (z : Complex) : abs (sinh z) ≤ (1 / 2 : ℝ) * Real.exp (abs z) := by
  sorry

/-- For any complex z, abs (cosh z) ≤ 1/2 * exp (abs z). -/
theorem abs_cosh_le_half_exp_abs (z : Complex) : abs (cosh z) ≤ (1 / 2 : ℝ) * Real.exp (abs z) := by
  sorry

args.natural_language_statement: Translate to Lean4: For any complex z, |sinh z| ≤ 1/2 * exp |z| and |cosh z| ≤ 1/2 * exp |z|. Use fully qualified names Complex.sinh, Complex.cosh, Complex.abs, Real.exp. End each theorem with := by sorry and import Mathlib at top.

import Mathlib

/-- For any complex z, Complex.abs (Complex.sinh z) ≤ 1/2 * Real.exp (Complex.abs z). -/
theorem abs_sinh_le_half_exp_abs (z : Complex) : Complex.abs (Complex.sinh z) ≤ (1 / 2 : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry

/-- For any complex z, Complex.abs (Complex.cosh z) ≤ 1/2 * Real.exp (Complex.abs z). -/
theorem abs_cosh_le_half_exp_abs (z : Complex) : Complex.abs (Complex.cosh z) ≤ (1 / 2 : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry
